caption.p: Stereomicroscopy and scanning electron microscopy analyses of differences in anther development and pollen development in sterile and reintroduction materials. (A, C, E, G, I) pol CMS sterile plants anthers, flower buds, and pollen grains in the corresponding period. (B, D, F, H, J) pol CMS recultivated plant stamens mature anthers, flower buds, pollen grains during differentiation
